name: Old Agathion
description: Old Agathion with the spirit's seal unbound. Double-click to unlock items

name: A Bottle of Souls
description: A bottle that holds 5 Souls. Double-click to fill the bottle. For Kamael use only. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 5 Souls
description: A bottle containing 5 Souls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael Exclusive Weapon. Disappears without effect if used by other races

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 5 Souls (For Combat)
description: A bottle containing 5 Souls. Usable only in combat. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael Exclusive Weapon. Disappears without effect if used by other races

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 10 Souls
description: A bottle containing 10 Souls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael exclusive item. Disappears without effect if used by other races

name: Dynastic Essence II
description: An item that can modify Dynasty Tunic. Powerful options are available for a modified Dynasty Tunic. Grants more powerful options than Dynastic Essence

name: Icarus Dual Sword
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of dual-swords, two-handed swords, two-handed blunt weapons and fist weapons will increase more than that of one-handed swords. When enchanted to 4 or more, increases Critical Attack by 109, and Max HP increases by 10%. Increases the damage inflicted during PvP

name: Blue Talisman - Explosion
description: Increases P. Atk./Atk. Spd. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Blue Talisman - Magic Explosion
description: Increases M. Atk. and M. Critical Rate . Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: White Talisman - Storm
description: Increases Wind attribute. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: White Talisman - Darkness
description: Increases Dark attribute. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: White Talisman - Water
description: Increases Water attribute. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: White Talisman - Fire
description: Instantly increases fire elemental. Only one effect is applied when you wear the same two talismans. Projection Weapons with no exchange/drop available\0

name: White Talisman - Light
description: Increases holy attribute. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Blue Talisman - Self-Destruction
description: Damages a nearby enemy with a powerful explosion. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Blue Talisman - Greater Healing
description: Increases heal power. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Improved Baby Pet Food
description: Automatically consumed when an improved baby pet's hunger gauge drops below 55%

name: Fenrir Necklace
description: A necklace that can summon a Fenrir. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns

name: Tully's Platinum Medal
description: Small, shiny platinum medal. It reads, 'Permission No.1 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'

name: Tully's Tin Medal
description: Small, shiny tin medal. It reads, 'Permission No.2 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'

description: Small, shiny lead medal. It reads, 'Permission No.3 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'

description: Small, shiny zinc medal. It reads, 'Permission No.4 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'

name: Tully's Copper Medal
description: Small, shiny copper medal. It reads, 'Permission No.5 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'

name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

name: Life Stone -  Level 82
description: General mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 82
description: Top-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons
